
{{Client event}}
This event is triggered whenever the local player's radio station is changed

==Parameters==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int stationID
</syntaxhighlight> 

*'''stationID''': An [[/int.md|int]]eger representing the station the player switched to.
Station ID's:
{{SoundID}}

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the local [[/player.md|player]].

==Cancel effect==
If this event is [[/Event_system#Canceling.md|canceled]], the Radio station will not change.
==Example== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
label = guiCreateLabel ( 0.8, 0.9, 0.2, 0.1, "Radio off", true) --create a label to show the station

function stationDraw(station)
	guiSetText ( label, getRadioChannelName(station)) --Show the station Name
end

addEventHandler("onClientPlayerRadioSwitch", getLocalPlayer(), stationDraw) -- add an event handler
</syntaxhighlight>
